entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 12:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:15 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:15 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:15 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
